title: Infineon Technologies
summary: Infineon Technologies AG is a German semiconductor manufacturer founded in 1999, when the semiconductor operations of the former parent company Siemens AG were spun off. Infineon has about 46,665 employees and is one of the ten largest semiconductor manufacturers worldwide.[2][3] It is market leader in automotive and power semiconductors.[3] In fiscal year 2020, the company achieved sales of â‚¬8.6 billion.[2] Infineon bought Cypress in April 2020.[3]
